name: Alcazar
description: Alcazar is building the bridge of luck between the real world and the crypto world on the ERC-20 chain. A next generation dApp with the purpose of making it possible for Alcazar, raffle away many high quality luxurious items in between our holders. The raffles will not only consist real world items such as high-end luxury watches, vehicles, tickets to different events but also different tokens in high amounts which makes it possible for everyone to become a whale in their dream token.
